description:
Celebal Technologies is a premier software services company in the field of Data Science, Big Data and Enterprise Cloud. Celebal Technologies helps you to discover the competitive advantage by employing intelligent data solutions using cutting-edge technology solutions that can bring massive value to your organization. The core offerings are around "Data to Intelligence", wherein we leverage data to extract intelligence and patterns thereby facilitating smarter and quicker decision making for clients.

Celebal Technologies solutions are powered by Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning algorithms which offer improved business efficiency in the interconnected world. Companies clients are Product ISVs and delivery organisations across the globe who use our niche expertise in product development as well as Enterprise project implementations. We have adopted the highest standards of service quality and operational excellence, enabling its clients across a wide range of industries to transform into a data-driven enterprise. Our tailor-made solutions help enterprises maximise productivity, improve speed and accuracy.

Our adept team industry experts have strong expertise in various industry-standard technologies along with niche emerging areas including Blockchain, Analytics & Visualization, IoT, Chatbot, Data Science- AI & ML. We have hands-on experience in developing and performing supply chain analytics and media greenlighting solutions, connect the dots across data pits for generating actionable insights. We help modernize legacy and on-premise applications by leveraging modern cloud paradigms such as Microservices, Advance Analytics, API Management and other Cloud-native services.

With Celebal Technologies, who understands the core value of modern analytics over the enterprise, we help the business in improving business intelligence and more data-driven in architecting solutions. Our analytics team caters to ad-hoc and defined business analytics
name: Celebal Technologies
tagline: Traditional Enterprise meets Modern Cloud Innovation

updates.text:
𝗖𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝗵𝗮𝘀 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗪𝗶𝗻𝗱𝘆 𝗖𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗲’𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗹𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗳𝗲𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗳 #𝗠𝗶𝗰𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗼𝗳𝘁𝗜𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗲𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰!  

The discussions here are all about the latest advancements in AI transformation, modernization, multicloud innovation, and data security—all crucial themes that resonate deeply with our mission at Celebal Technologies.  

We are particularly looking forward to the conversations around #ResponsibleAI and its role in enhancing #cybersecurity while navigating today’s challenges. Meet our team of experts who are all set to showcase our tailored solutions to streamline operations and enable smarter data-driven decision-making. 

If you’re here in Chicago, let’s connect! We’d love to chat about how we can leverage #AI adoption, #cloud migration, and #governance strategies to drive real enterprise growth.  

So, who's with us for #MSIgnite? Let’s make it happen!

Our unique industry data models around #SmartManufacturing, #SupplyChainAnalytics, #IoTDeviceAnalytics, #SentimentAnalytics, and more are pushing the boundaries of what's possible in driving operational efficiency and transforming data into actionable insights across the digital realm.  

So, what’s stopping you from accelerating intelligent decision-making for your enterprise? 𝗦𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗹𝗲 𝗮 𝗺𝗲𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 & 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘀𝘁𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗡𝗼.𝟭𝟮 𝘁𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝗝𝗘𝗗 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀, 𝗭𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗵 𝗻𝗼𝘄! https://lnkd.in/gjHXckte

𝗚𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗮𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝗱𝗿𝗶𝗱, 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝘂𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗴𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲!  
 
This #DAIWT2024 stop was a powerful celebration of innovation and collaboration, bringing together thousands of data enthusiasts, visionaries, and industry leaders. Our solution experts' deep insights on #GenerativeAI, #SAPDataModernization, #EDWMigration, and #UCMigration showcased our mastery in simplifying complex #DataEcosystems. The energy and excitement from the event reaffirmed our dedication to modernizing #LegacySystems, driving seamless cloud migrations, and delivering transformative impact on a global scale. 

Lastly, a heartfelt appreciation to the entire Databricks team for organizing such a comprehensive & impactful global gathering—truly paving the way for the future of data and AI! 

P.S. We’re excited for the journey ahead and can’t wait to continue the momentum at our upcoming #DAIWT stops in Zurich & Paris. Check out Celebal Technologies' full schedule & stay tuned for more opportunities to create success stories together! https://lnkd.in/gjHXckte

Our technical solution architects are preparing for the next stop of the 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮+𝗔𝗜 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝗧𝗼𝘂𝗿 at 𝗝𝗘𝗗 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀, 𝗭𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗵 tomorrow!

Meet our in-demand experts at 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗻𝗼. 𝟭𝟮 to discover how our #GenAI capabilities streamline #EnterpriseGradeModels, simplify data consolidation, and enhance management across diverse sources. Additionally, learn how we unify these models within a powerful #MLOps framework, ensuring scalability & operational efficiency for your enterprise. 

Get ready to advance your #EnterpriseOperations with Celebal Technologies– your ultimate partner in driving data-powered decisions and next-level intelligent automation.

Join us & discover how Databricks #AssetBundles are speeding up data application development and explore the power of #DeltaLake’s #ACIDTransactions for consistent, high-performance data processing. 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗔𝗜 𝗝𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗻𝗲𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝗠𝗶𝗰𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗼𝗳𝘁 𝗜𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗲 – 𝗝𝗼𝗶𝗻 𝗖𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗰𝗹𝘂𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲! 
 
As proud recipients of Microsoft’s AI Partner of the Year, India, 2024, we invite you to connect with us at McCormick Place West from 𝗡𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝟭𝟵–𝟮𝟮, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 for #MicrosoftIgnite to streamline every aspect of your data journey. Join our solution experts to deep dive into our advanced services & accelerators powered by Microsoft which can: 
 
• Empower your enterprise with data-driven solutions at scale using our #AzureMachineLearning capabilities, optimizing your entire #MLLifecycle for smarter decision-making. 
• Enhance your data functionality & control through our #MicrosoftFabric expertise enabling real-time data processing & advanced analytics. 
• Refine your workflows via our hands on experience around #Microsoft365Copilot, driving innovation and delivering impactful results. 
• Integrate your analytics across big data and data warehousing via our competence in #AzureSynapse, opening powerful insights for your enterprise. 
• Strengthen your data security with our advanced #PowerPlatform expertise, driving efficiency and innovation while ensuring governance.  
 
Open doors to next-level scalability, security, & intelligence. Engage with us at this exclusive innovation & tech summit!

𝗖𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗯𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝟴 𝗬𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗘𝘅𝗰𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗮𝘁 𝗖𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝗶𝗲𝘀! 

We are excited to mark our 𝟴-𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿 𝗷𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗻𝗲𝘆, where the Celebal Technologies Jaipur team truly brought the house down at this year’s #AnnualCelebration! With 𝟭𝟮𝟬𝟬+ 𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗲𝗲𝘀 and 𝟭𝟬𝟬 𝗴𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝘀 in attendance, it was a grand event that showcased our growth and success.

The evening kicked off with a delightful High Tea & Networking event that set the tone for the day. A highlight was the 𝗙𝗶𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝘁 featuring Anirudh Kala, Anupam Gupta, and Shiv Chaudhary, whose experiences and insights motivated our employees to strive for excellence in their work.

Adding to the excitement, the incredibly talented 𝗔𝗻𝘂𝗯𝗵𝗮𝘃 𝗦𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗵 𝗕𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗶 gave an amazing performance that created a lively atmosphere. This was followed by engaging activities, including a fun 𝗽𝗵𝗼𝘁𝗼 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 and 𝘃𝗶𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗱𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 that showcased our team’s talent.

We also held a heartfelt 𝗥&𝗥 𝗰𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝗻𝘆 to honor our dedicated #Celebalites for their hard work and contributions and enjoyed a delicious dinner that brought everyone together.

A huge thank you to everyone who participated and made this event such a success. Here’s to many more wonderful gatherings as we continue to grow and succeed together!

𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗔𝘀𝗶𝗮’𝘀 𝘃𝗶𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗵𝘂𝗯𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗡𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗵 𝗔𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗮’𝘀 𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗰𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗘𝘂𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗲’𝘀 𝗵𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗰 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘁, 𝘄𝗲’𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗲𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗔𝗜 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗿𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗽𝘀! 
 
Our tech experts are live today at all three #DAIWT locations—Toronto, Tokyo, and Amsterdam. Be sure to stop by 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗡𝗼. 𝟯 in Toronto to explore our proven capabilities, including:
 
• 𝗟𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗵𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 with platforms like Databricks for unified data management. 
• 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝘂𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘀 to enhance operational efficiency & drive strategic decision-making. 
• 𝗘𝗻𝗱-𝘁𝗼-𝗘𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗘𝗗𝗪 𝗠𝗶𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 using advanced 𝗔𝗜-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀 for data profiling and seamless transitions. 
• 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 𝗥𝗼𝗯𝗼𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 (𝗥𝗣𝗔) with machine learning models and NLP for smarter, more efficient workflows. 
• 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗟𝗮𝗸𝗲𝘀 with existing systems, using machine learning models to derive direct actionable insights. 
 
Get ready to experience the power-packed unification of data management with advanced analytics! Check out our full event lineup and book your meeting with us now! https://lnkd.in/gjHXckte

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗮𝗻 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗰𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗯𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗦𝗔𝗣 𝗡𝗢𝗪!

We’re thrilled to be back and share the highlights from an event that truly showcased the power of collaboration. The synergy between Celebal Technologies, Microsoft and SAP brought together industry leaders to explore the exciting future of enterprise technology.

Raman J S Dhooria, our Vice President - Global Business Development and Peter B., SAP BTP GTM and Co-Engineering Lead, Microsoft captivated the audience with their session on the "𝗔𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗹𝗲." They underlined how integrating 𝗠𝗶𝗰𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗼𝗳𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗔𝗣 𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘀𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺𝘀 is not just a breakthrough but a significant opportunity to enhance productivity and streamline operations in today’s AI-driven environment. 

This integration is set to transform how businesses leverage technology to improve decision-making, elevate user experiences and collaboration, and foster sustainable growth.

Throughout the event, we engaged in meaningful discussions with SAP customers about the future of SAP transformations on Microsoft technologies. We also explored innovative use cases around advanced ERP solutions powered by AI on BTP on Azure.

A big thank you to 𝗠𝗶𝗰𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗼𝗳𝘁 and 𝗦𝗔𝗣 Switzerland for such an informative event and to all our partners and customers for their collaboration. Together, we’re not just imagining what’s next—we’re actively creating it!

Whether it’s 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗼𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗱𝗲𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴, or 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁, our 𝗦𝗔𝗣 𝗘𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗽𝗿𝗶𝘀𝗲 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗔𝗜 accelerators can streamline operations and reduce manual efforts by analyzing historical data & allowing real-time adjustments, eventually boosting visibility and driving smarter decision-making for your enterprise.
